name: *swoosh* bubble-fishing!
description:
made by Mark Wonnacott, Sophie Humphries, and Tom Boot in seven days for (http://jam.legendaryfisher.com/)

controls

  • left click / analogue stick - swing bubble wand
  • right click / controller button - extend bubble wand

audio from various creative commons sources:

  • tuturne.mp3 is Tuturne Land by maf
  • bubbles.ogg sound by Glaneur de sons
  • bell.ogg sound by Benboncan
  • waves.ogg derived from sound by Leandros Ntounis
  • splash.ogg derived from sound by AGFX
